Body:
snapper = Snapper()
sensor_a = Sensor()
snapper.add_sensor(sensor_a)
sensor_b = Sensor()
snapper.add_sensor(sensor_b)
sensor_b.publish(3)
snapshot = snapper.get_snapshot()
assert sensor_a.uuid in snapshot
assert snapshot[sensor_a.uuid] is None
assert round(snapshot[sensor_b.uuid] - 3, 5) == 0
